summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5747 for the improvement of West Morgan Street, from California Avenue to the alley east of 34th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75812 as amended by Ordinance No. 75930, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
